channel.title: need help with vhost creation
channel.description: I need help about creation of a vhost I read to type !vhost some.fake.host. Is it the same as writting !vhost myfakehost or do I need to write !vhost myfakehost.host? regards

item.title: need help with vhost creation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Please re-read my previous answer.

Read full topic

item.title: need help with vhost creation
item.dc:creator: unamigo
item.description:
Hi Patrick
When I asked the question, I was on Xchat .14 and .15
I still do not get the correct way of doing it
in .14
I enter
/j #vhost
in .15
What should I enter?
!vhost some.fake.host?
or
what some.fake.host mean? and where can I find some.fake.host?
The ones that can give you in xxx.euirc.net and what is xxx can I write for example !vhost myvhost.euirc.net or should they give me the xxx value?
Regards

Read full topic

item.title: need help with vhost creation
item.dc:creator: unamigo
item.description:
Thanks all of you
REgards

Read full topic

item.title: need help with vhost creation
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
The custom vhost in this context is an IRC network specific feature.
http://www.euirc.net/en/tutorial.php#vhost

Unrelated to Whonix. Whonix does not get into the way here. That IRC network specific feature is not available on all irc networks. The one to ask in this case are the operators of that IRC network.

See also Whonix IRC / XChat documentation that contains links to other pages with tons of IRC anonymity/security education:

Whonix

HexChat

Anonymous IRC Chat. HexChat (previously called XChat) over the Tor Anonymity Network.

Please read also this:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Support#General_Advice

Read full topic

item.title: need help with vhost creation
item.dc:creator: unamigo
item.description:
No. It is for whonix. In the Xchat guide in anonguide point 15 says " In the next window that open, type “!vhost some.fake.host” and press “enter” to set your virtual host…
So, it is here as do not understand very well how to set my virtual host
The steps are
/j #vhost and in the next window the guide says the above and my question is how I choose the a correct virtual host for me. Do I have to write !vhost some.fake.host or do I have to choose whatever a want and the right sintaxis to do it. regards

Read full topic

item.title: need help with vhost creation
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Sorry but in what context? Are you talking about vhost creation for Apache? Because that question is one we can’t answer here, as this forum is for Whonix centered questions only.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
